original: intros H1 H2. induction P as [|ρ P IHP]. -- simpl. unfold mm_no_self_loops. intros j [Hj1 Hj2]. inversion Hj2. -- simpl. unfold mm_no_self_loops in *. intros j [Hj1 Hj2]. destruct (subcode_g k i (ρ :: P) j (f k j ρ) (conj Hj1 (or_introl eq_refl))) as [ρ' [H3 H4]]. + exists (f k j ρ). apply subcode_g. constructor. auto. + rewrite H4 in Hj2. specialize (IHP j (conj (Nat.lt_succ_l _ _ Hj1) Hj2)). destruct IHP as [j' [H5 H6]]. exists j'. split. auto. rewrite g_app. apply in_app_iff. right. apply in_or_app. auto.
